name: 3D Truck Car Parking Simulator - School Bus Driving Test Games!
name_original: 3D Truck Car Parking Simulator - School Bus Driving Test Games!
description:
Are you ready to play an Beach Truck Parking Simulator Game?

Play dozens of super challenging and fun parking missions -- all around an electric beach city!!

Hop into a monster tractor trailor, fire truck, school bus, and many more vehicles!!

Test your parking skills around the city - but be careful: highly addictive!!
